info.title: opendataAPI
info.description: Open data API from open dataset

get.summary: Get a list of inflation rates
Get details of an inflation rate

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the inflation rate to retrieve

400.description: Not Found. Inflation rate with the given ID not found

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the inflation rate to update

requestBody.description: Data to update an existing inflation rate

404.description: Not Found. Inflation rate with the given ID not found

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the inflation rate to delete

400.description: Not Found. Inflation rate with the given ID not found

requestBody.description: Data to create a new inflation rate

get.summary: Get a paginated list of rice production data by districts.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of items per page.

post.summary: Create a new rice production record.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the rice production record to be retrieved.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the rice production to update

requestBody.description: Data to update an existing rice production

404.description: Not Found. Rice Production with the given ID not found

delete.summary: Delete a rice production record by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the rice production record to be deleted.
